hadiths.text: Abdullah b. Abu Qatada, on the authority of his father, reported Allah's Apostle (ﷺ) forbidding the preparation of the mixture of ripe dates and unripe dates, and the mixture of grapes and dates, and that of nearly ripe dates and fresh dates but the Prophet said:Prepare the Nabidh from each one of them separately

chapter.ara-name: باب كَرَاهَةِ انْتِبَاذِ التَّمْرِ وَالزَّبِيبِ مَخْلُوطَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: It is disliked to make Nabidh by mixing dried dates and raisins
